bio: I know I might look serious all the time, but honestly, I’m just a chill guy who loves good food, great conversations, and a solid gym session.
At work, I thrive in a team—I keep an open mind, love brainstorming ideas, and enjoy making things happen with a great group of people.
If you find me at the bar, I’ll be the one starting conversations and making sure everyone’s having a good time.
And if you bring up tech, gaming, or anything nerdy, prepare for a deep dive.
Outside of work, I’m either in the gym or in the kitchen, experimenting with new recipes.
